# avAudioNode

**Instance Property**

The audio node’s current audio asset.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var avAudioNode: AVAudioNode? { get set }
```

```swift
var avAudioNode: AVAudioNode? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The AV audio node must refer to an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEngine] sound graph from a single sound source or URL.

## Configuring Audio Nodes

- **isPositional**: A Boolean property that indicates whether the node’s audio is altered based on the position of the node.
- **autoplayLooped**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the audio should play in a loop when the node is added to the scene.
